text: Former Indian cricket captain Krishnamachari Srikkanth felicitating G. Vasanth, HoD (Visual Communication), D.G. Vaishnav College, at a function held by SocialPedia on Thursday. The function, held in association with Akshaya Patra, honoured NGOs, activist groups and students and faculty members of D.G. Vaishnav College, for their service during the floods —Photo: K. Pichumani
title: Spirit of service
